content: this is a free pattern to create a big basket with an oval base the basket can be used to organize anything you want i used for video-games controller but you can use it for crochet hooks stationery make-up kids toys etc at this link 1 you can find a video i recorded to show how to create the oval with the help of stitch markers happy crochet 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=m5udfxvj4bc&feature=youtu be
